text: The tax shall be computed upon the taxable net income of the estate or trust, and shall be paid by the fiduciary, except as provided in § 47-1809.07 (relating to revocable trusts) and § 47-1809.08 (relating to income for benefit of the grantor).

subchapter.text: Tax on Estates and Trusts. (Refs & Annos)
